title: Storing Zucchini and Squash

items.name: Refrigerator crisper drawer
items.details: Store whole and unwashed zucchini and squash in the crisper drawer of the fridge. They will stay firm for about a week.

items.name: Keep whole and unwashed
items.details: Do not wash or cut until you are ready to use them. This helps them stay fresh longer.

notes: Simple storage: keep them whole, unwashed, in the fridge crisper drawer. About 1 week shelf life.
